To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private Harami _harami;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_harami = Harami(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_harami.IsReady)
{
    var current = _harami.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.harami = self.Harami(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.harami.IsReady:
    current = self.harami.Current.Value
